pages.text: Prismarine rails work exactly like their standard counterparts, except they are waterloggable and can be placed under water. However, an entity in a normal minecart will still get kicked out if they are entirely submerged in water. This can be prevented through the use of $(l:thermal:storage_and_transport/locomotion/underwaterminecart)underwater minecarts$(/l). Prismarine rails also emit a light level of 8.
